name: SisyphuS (itch) (deslize)
description:
INTERACT WITH Z KEY!

Embark on an epic journey in a mysterious and exciting game where you must climb to the peak of a towering mountain to reunite lost dogs with their rightful owner. But beware, danger lurks in every corner, and you never know what secrets the mountain may hold. Will you be able to bring the dogs home safely? The climb to the summit awaits!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features : 

-An Indie, top-down adventure game!! 

-Engaging and surprising storyline!

-Gameboy's nostalgia

-Simple and easy controls

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

David Leite

Diogo Abreu

Nuno Leal

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sprites used - https://jaredchansen.itch.io/sci-fi-adventure-tileset by jaredchansen
